channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 NBA Cup Odds: Thunder Favored to Repeat; SGA Leads MVP Board
item.description: The 2025 NBA Cup continues on Friday. See the odds for who is slated to win the latest in-season tournament.

item.title: The Biggest Question Facing Each NFL Team in the Second Half of 2025
item.description: The NFL has hit the mid-point of the 2025 season, and every team has at least one huge question they'll need to answer in the second half.

item.title: Tom Brady on Bay Area Homecoming: A Special Win Against the 49ers
item.description: NFL legend Tom Brady recounts one of his favorite games from his playing career: a memorable trip back to the Bay Area to play the San Francisco 49ers...

item.title: Gio Reyna Returns to the U.S. Men's Team; Pulisic, McKennie Stay Back
item.description: Gio Reyna is back with the U.S. men’s national team for the first time since March.

item.title: Dallas Cowboys Defensive End Marshawn Kneeland Dies at 24
item.description: Dallas Cowboys defensive end Marshawn Kneeland died on Thursday morning, the team announced. He was 24.

item.title: Rankings, contract projections for top 50 MLB free agents
item.description: How much will the biggest stars get paid this winter? Kiley McDaniel breaks down the 2025-26 free agent class.

item.title: Barnwell's midseason awards: Ranking candidates for MVP, Rookie of the Year, more
item.description: Which QBs are in the MVP mix? Let's pick three front-runners for seven NFL awards through nine weeks.

item.title: What to know ahead of Brazilian Grand Prix sprint weekend
item.description: Formula 1 has reached round 21 and heads to Interlagos, Brazil for the São Paulo Grand Prix. Everything you need to know for the upcoming sprint weeke...

item.title: 'He's the best pass rusher': How Nik Bonitto's first step has helped him become an NFL star
item.description: Bonitto's ability to explode into his pass rush has made him a leader of the Broncos' great defense -- and a Defensive Player of the Year candidate.

item.title: The NFL at midseason: Separating the good, bad and ugly for all 32 teams
item.description: The 2025 season has hit the midway point, and we have things to watch in the second half, key QB stats and fantasy nuggets for all 32 teams.
